story.subtitle: Our Heritage
story.title: A Legacy of <1>Excellence</1>
story.p1: Founded in 1998, Golden Fork began with a singular vision: to create a dining experience that transcends the ordinary. What started as a humble passion for authentic flavors has evolved into a sanctuary for culinary artistry.
story.p2: Our chefs meticulously source the finest ingredients from around the globe, ensuring that every plate served is a testament to quality and innovation. We believe that food is not just sustenance, but a journey of the senses.

1.text: An absolute masterpiece of dining. The atmosphere, the service, and above all, the food, creates an experience that transcends the ordinary.
1.name: Jonathan Gold

2.text: The wine pairing was exquisite. Each sip complemented the dishes perfectly. A truly magical evening.
2.name: Isabella Rossi

3.text: As a chef myself, I am blown away by the attention to detail. The Wagyu Tartare is simply world-class.
3.name: Alexander Chen
